UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Discovery of Hydrocarbon-Stapled Short alpha-Helical Peptides as Promising Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (MERS-CoV) Fusion Inhibitors.
Literature.Author: Wang C, Xia S, Zhang P, Zhang T, Wang W, Tian Y, Meng G, Jiang S, Liu K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: MERS-CoV(IC50 F=0.63±0.05µM),MERS-CoV PsV(IC50 I=2.8±0.74µM),Cov-Q1020H PsV(IC50 I=4.15±0.25µM),Cov-Q1020R PsV(IC50 I=2.49±0.18µM),MERS-CoV PsV(IC50 I=2.57±0.24µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma Huh7(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>100µM),Human lung carcinoma Calu-3(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>100µM)
